statements: DELETE FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE vehicle_id = 101 AND scheduled_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE technician_id = 205 OR (maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' AND scheduled_time >= '2022-06-01');
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND maintenance_type = 'Engine Check';
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe' AND maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM vehicle WHERE year < 2010 AND manufacturer = 'Ford';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE vehicle_id = 3 AND technician_id = 5;
